captions.text: - So Sara, can I try on your glasses?

- Yeah I guess, I mean
it's not like they cost
Do I look like a hipster librarian?
- Sara, you know who you look like?
- So, just another woman with glasses?
Where did I put my glasses?

title: Truths Every Girl With Glasses Knows

comments.text:
I agree with all of this, except, when I'm asked "Can I try those on?" they 
don't wait for me to say yes, they just take them off, and bend them out of 
shape GRR! Rant over. =]﻿

comments.author: Beatrice Castliogini

comments.text:
It's been a few years since I've been to a 3-D movie so they may have 
changed. But, I hated 3-D Movies because the3-D glasses would not fit 
properly over my glasses. I would try going without wearing my glasses (I 
have a mild astigmatism so its not terribly blurry but my eyes get sore & 
tired quickly) and try with my glasses either way I'd get a headache and 
not be able to enjoy the movie.﻿
